New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most three-pointers in a debut with six three-pointers.
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 28 points, grabbed 10 rebounds, and dished out eight assists despite a rusty performance.
Klay Thompson scored 22 points, shot 6/10 from three-point range, and had seven rebounds and three steals.
Dereck Lively II had his first 15/10/5 game with 15 points, 11 rebounds, and six assists.
